<S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G683>cast<s%> <S%G683>away<s%> his <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4267>foreknew.<s%> <S%G1492>Know<s%> you not <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> of <S%G2243>Elias?<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he <S%G1793>makes<s%> <S%G1793>intercession<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%><S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2962>Lord,<s%> they have <S%G615>killed<s%> your <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G2679>dig<s%> <S%G2679>down<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2379>altars;<s%> and I am <S%G5275>left<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and they <S%G2212>seek<s%> my <S%G5590>life.<s%>

But <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G5538>answer<s%> of God to him? I have <S%G2641>reserved<s%> to <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2035>seven<s%> <S%G2035>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have not <S%G2578>bowed<s%> the <S%G1119>knee<s%> to the image of <S%G896>Baal.<s%>

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> there is a <S%G3005>remnant<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1589>election<s%> of <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> by <S%G5485>grace,<s%> then is it <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> of <S%G2041>works:<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%> But <S%G1487>if<s%> it be of <S%G2041>works,<s%> then it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G5485>grace:<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> has not <S%G2013>obtained<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G1934>seeks<s%> for; but the <S%G1589>election<s%> has <S%G2013>obtained<s%> it, and the <S%G3062>rest<s%> were <S%G4456>blinded.<s%>

<S%G2531>(According<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> them the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G2659>slumber,<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> that they should not <S%G991>see,<s%> and <S%G3775>ears<s%> that they should not <S%G191>hear;<s%>) to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

And <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> Let their <S%G5132>table<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G3803>snare,<s%> and a <S%G2339>trap,<s%> and a stumbling <S%G4625>block,<s%> and a <S%G468>recompense<s%> to them:
Let their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> that they may not <S%G991>see,<s%> and <S%G4781>bow<s%> <S%G4781>down<s%> their <S%G3577>back<s%> <S%G1275>always.<s%>

I <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> Have they <S%G4417>stumbled<s%> that they should <S%G4098>fall?<s%> <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid:<s%> <S%G1096><s%> but rather through their <S%G3900>fall<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> is come to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> for to <S%G3863>provoke<s%> them to jealousy.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3900>fall<s%> of them be the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and the <S%G2275>diminishing<s%> of them the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> their <S%G4138>fullness?<s%>

For I <S%G3004>speak<s%> to you <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G1909>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G652>apostle<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> I <S%G1392>magnify<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1248>office:<s%>

<S%G1513>If<s%> by <S%G4458>any<s%> <S%G4458>means<s%> I may <S%G3863>provoke<s%> to <S%G3863>emulation<s%> them which are my <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and might <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of them.

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G580>casting<s%> <S%G580>away<s%> of them be the <S%G2643>reconciling<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall the <S%G4356>receiving<s%> of them be, but <S%G2222>life<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead?<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the first <S%G536>fruit<s%> be <S%G40>holy,<s%> the <S%G5445>lump<s%> is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G40>holy:<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> be <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> are the <S%G2798>branches.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2798>branches<s%> be <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off,<s%> and you, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G65>wild<s%> <S%G65>olive<s%> <S%G65>tree,<s%> were <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in <S%G1722>among<s%> them, and with them <S%G1096>partake<s%> <S%G4791><s%> of the <S%G4491>root<s%> and <S%G4096>fatness<s%> of the <S%G1636>olive<s%> tree;
<S%G2620>Boast<s%> not <S%G2620>against<s%> the <S%G2798>branches.<s%> But <S%G1487>if<s%> you boast, you <S%G941>bore<s%> not the <S%G4491>root,<s%> but the <S%G4491>root<s%> you.
You will <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> The <S%G2798>branches<s%> were <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off,<s%> that I might be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in.

<S%G2573>Well;<s%> because of <S%G570>unbelief<s%> they were <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off,<s%> and you <S%G2476>stand<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%> Be not high <S%G5309>minded,<s%> but <S%G5399>fear:<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> not the <S%G2596>natural<s%> <S%G5449><s%> <S%G2798>branches,<s%> take <S%G3708>heed<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> he <S%G3761>also<s%> <S%G5339>spare<s%> not you.

<S%G1492>Behold<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5544>goodness<s%> and <S%G663>severity<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them which <S%G4098>fell,<s%> <S%G663>severity;<s%> but <S%G1909>toward<s%> you, <S%G5544>goodness,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G1961>continue<s%> in his <S%G5544>goodness:<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> shall be <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>off.<s%>

And they <S%G1161>also,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G1961>abide<s%> not still in <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> shall be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in: for <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G1461>graft<s%> them in <S%G3825>again.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> you were <S%G1581>cut<s%> out of the <S%G65>olive<s%> <S%G65>tree<s%> which is <S%G65>wild<s%> by <S%G5449>nature,<s%> and were <S%G1461>grafted<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to <S%G5449>nature<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2565>good<s%> <S%G2565>olive<s%> <S%G2565>tree:<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall <S%G3778>these,<s%> which be the <S%G2596>natural<s%> <S%G5449><s%> <S%G2798>branches,<s%> be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> into their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1636>olive<s%> tree?

For I <S%G2309>would<s%> not, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that you should be <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you should be <S%G5429>wise<s%> in <S%G3844>your<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G3844>conceits;<s%> <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G4457>blindness<s%> in <S%G3313>part<s%> is <S%G1096>happened<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> be <S%G1525>come<s%> in.

And <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved:<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> There shall <S%G2240>come<s%> out of <S%G4622>Sion<s%> the <S%G4506>Deliverer,<s%> and shall <S%G654>turn<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> from <S%G2384>Jacob:<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> is my <S%G1242>covenant<s%> to them, <S%G3752>when<s%> I shall <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> their <S%G266>sins.<s%>

As <S%G2596>concerning<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> they are <S%G2190>enemies<s%> for <S%G5209>your<s%> sakes: but as <S%G2596>touching<s%> the <S%G1589>election,<s%> they are <S%G27>beloved<s%> for the <S%G3962>father's<s%> sakes.
For the <S%G5486>gifts<s%> and <S%G2821>calling<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> are <S%G278>without<s%> <S%G278>repentance.<s%>
For as you in <S%G4218>times<s%> past have not <S%G544>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> yet have <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1653>obtained<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> through their <S%G543>unbelief:<s%>

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> have <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> not <S%G544>believed,<s%> that through <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G1653>obtain<s%> <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>
For <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4788>concluded<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G543>unbelief,<s%> that he might have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3956>all.<s%>

O the <S%G899>depth<s%> of the <S%G4149>riches<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G419>unsearchable<s%> are his <S%G2917>judgments,<s%> and his <S%G3598>ways<s%> <S%G421>past<s%> <S%G421>finding<s%> out!
For <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1096>been<s%> his <S%G4825>counselor?<s%>
<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4272>first<s%> <S%G4272>given<s%> to him, and it shall be <S%G467>recompensed<s%> to him <S%G467>again?<s%>
For of him, and <S%G1223>through<s%> him, and to him, are <S%G3956>all<s%> things: to <S%G846>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
